com.escape.games.core
Class GameTaskWithChannel

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.escape.games.core.GameTask
          com.escape.games.core.GameTaskWithChannel
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskChannel, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameCycle, GameObjectLoader, TimerService
public abstract class GameTaskWithChannel
extends GameTask
implements TaskChannel

Base class for a task with an input channel for receiving messages. A Blocking Queue is waited on, then a batch of up to CAP messages are drained and then processed, before the next BQ operation.

Author:
escape-llc

startup

protected abstract void startup()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Perform task startup activities. Should fail fast. Called once per lifecycle.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - startup error.

shutdown

protected abstract void shutdown()
Perform task shutdown activities. Must Not Throw. Must handle partial initialization by startup(). Called once per lifecycle.
